verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> that came to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Thus <S%H559>speaks<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3789>Write<s%> all the <S%H1697>words<s%> that I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to you in a <S%H5612>book.<s%>

<S%H3117>For,<s%> behold, the days <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> that I will turn <S%H7725>again<s%> the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and I will cause them to <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> that I <S%H5414>gave<s%> to their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and they shall possess <S%H3423>it.<s%>
These are the <S%H1697>words<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> concerning <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and concerning <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>
For thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> We have <S%H8085>heard<s%> a <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H2731>trembling,<s%> of <S%H6343>fear,<s%> and not of <S%H7965>peace.<s%>

<S%H7592>Ask<s%> <S%H7200>now,<s%> and see whether a <S%H2145>man<s%> does travail with <S%H3205>child:<s%> why do I <S%H7200>see<s%> every <S%H1397>man<s%> with his <S%H3027>hands<s%> on his <S%H2504>waist,<s%> as a woman in <S%H3205>travail,<s%> and all <S%H6440>faces<s%> are <S%H2015>turned<s%> into <S%H3420>paleness?<s%>

<S%H1945>Alas!<s%> for that <S%H3117>day<s%> is <S%H1419>great,<s%> so <S%H369>that<s%> none is like <S%H6256>it:<s%> it is even the time of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>'s <S%H6869>trouble;<s%> but he shall be saved out of <S%H3467>it.<s%>

It shall come to pass in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> that I will <S%H7665>break<s%> his <S%H5923>yoke<s%> from off your <S%H6677>neck,<s%> and will <S%H5423>burst<s%> your <S%H4147>bonds;<s%> and <S%H2114>strangers<s%> shall no more make him their <S%H5647>bondservant;<s%>
but they shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> their <S%H4428>king,<s%> whom I will raise up to <S%H6965>them.<s%>

Therefore <S%H3372>don't<s%> you be afraid, O <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> my <S%H5650>servant,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> neither be <S%H2865>dismayed,<s%> <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H3467>for,<s%> behold, I will save you from <S%H7350>afar,<s%> and your <S%H2233>seed<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H7628>captivity;<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> shall <S%H7725>return,<s%> and shall be <S%H8252>quiet<s%> and at <S%H7599>ease,<s%> and none shall make him <S%H2729>afraid.<s%>

For I am with <S%H5002>you,<s%> says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H6213>you:<s%> for I will make a full <S%H3617>end<s%> of all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> where I have <S%H6327>scattered<s%> <S%H6213>you,<s%> but I will not make a full <S%H3617>end<s%> of <S%H3256>you;<s%> but I will correct you in <S%H4941>measure,<s%> and will in no way <S%H5352>leave<s%> you <S%H5352>unpunished.<s%>
For thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> Your <S%H7667>hurt<s%> is <S%H605>incurable,<s%> and your <S%H4347>wound<s%> <S%H2470>grievous.<s%>
There is none to <S%H1777>plead<s%> your <S%H1779>cause,<s%> that you may be bound <S%H4205>up:<s%> you have no <S%H8585>healing<s%> <S%H7499>medicines.<s%>

All your <S%H157>lovers<s%> have <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> <S%H1875>you;<s%> they don't seek <S%H5221>you:<s%> for I have wounded you with the <S%H4347>wound<s%> of an <S%H341>enemy,<s%> with the <S%H4148>chastisement<s%> of a cruel <S%H394>one,<s%> for the <S%H7230>greatness<s%> of your <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> because your <S%H2403>sins<s%> were <S%H6105>increased.<s%>

Why do you <S%H2199>cry<s%> for your <S%H7667>hurt?<s%> Your <S%H4341>pain<s%> is <S%H605>incurable:<s%> for the <S%H7230>greatness<s%> of your <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> because your <S%H2403>sins<s%> were <S%H6105>increased,<s%> I have done these things to <S%H6213>you.<s%>

Therefore all those who <S%H398>devour<s%> you shall be <S%H398>devoured;<s%> and all your <S%H6862>adversaries,<s%> everyone of <S%H3212>them,<s%> shall go into <S%H7628>captivity;<s%> and those who <S%H4933>despoil<s%> you shall be a <S%H7601>spoil,<s%> and all who <S%H962>prey<s%> on you will I <S%H5414>give<s%> for a <S%H957>prey.<s%>

For I will <S%H5927>restore<s%> <S%H724>health<s%> to <S%H7495>you,<s%> and I will heal you of your <S%H4347>wounds,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> because they have <S%H7121>called<s%> you an <S%H5080>outcast,<s%> <S%H6726>saying,<s%> It is Zion, whom no man seeks <S%H1875>after.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H7725>Behold,<s%> I will turn again the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>'s <S%H168>tents,<s%> and have <S%H7355>compassion<s%> on his <S%H4908>dwelling<s%> <S%H5892>places;<s%> and the city shall be <S%H1129>built<s%> on its own <S%H8510>hill,<s%> and the <S%H759>palace<s%> shall be <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> in its own <S%H4941>way.<s%>

Out of them shall <S%H3318>proceed<s%> <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%> and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of those who make <S%H7832>merry:<s%> and I will <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H4591>them,<s%> and they shall not be few; I will also <S%H3513>glorify<s%> <S%H6819>them,<s%> and they shall not be small.

Their <S%H1121>children<s%> also shall be as <S%H6924>before,<s%> and their <S%H5712>congregation<s%> shall be <S%H3559>established<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6485>me;<s%> and I will punish all who oppress <S%H3905>them.<s%>

Their <S%H117>prince<s%> shall be of <S%H4910>themselves,<s%> and their ruler shall <S%H3318>proceed<s%> from their <S%H7130>midst;<s%> and I will cause him to draw <S%H7126>near,<s%> and he shall <S%H5066>approach<s%> to <S%H6148>me:<s%> for who is he who has had <S%H3820>boldness<s%> to <S%H5066>approach<s%> to <S%H5002>me?<s%> says <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
You shall be my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and I will be your <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H5591>Behold,<s%> the storm of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> his <S%H2534>wrath,<s%> has gone <S%H3318>forth,<s%> a <S%H1641>sweeping<s%> <S%H5591>storm:<s%> it shall <S%H2342>burst<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>

The <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will not <S%H7725>return,<s%> until he has <S%H6213>executed,<s%> and until he has <S%H6965>performed<s%> the <S%H4209>intentions<s%> of his <S%H3820>heart.<s%> In the <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you will understand <S%H995>it.<s%>
